name: Possibili Tee
description:
LOVE is all around.
There was a time when my doubts were at an all time high. To release the tension, I wrote down sentences hoping to cheer me up. This sentence was one of them.

Style No. 120001
100% Cotton
Ladies/Youth size. These sizes run on the smaller end.
Preshrunk to minimize shrinkage.
Screen Printed Design, Tag, and Logo.
Estivation screen printed logo in black on back upper right shoulder.

Body width: 

S	14 ½”
M	15 ¾”
L	16 ¼”

Body width taken 1" below armhole for sizing

name: Best Trini Tee
description:
Best 
Part of the Trini Tee collection Best, Friends, Forever
As a teen, I've always loved those 2 piece broken heart necklaces that had "best" or "friends" on one piece. Why not have them on tees? These tees express who your bestie/besties is/are. Wear together with a friend as "best friends", "friends forever" or with two other friends as "best friends forever". Or if you are just simply the best, why not wear the Best Tee alone?
Modeled by Toniann.

Style No. 120006
100% Combed Cotton jersey
Direct to Garment printed design, tag and logo.
Estivation logo printed on back lower right.

	            Width	    Length
Small	15 ½ “	25 ½ “
Medium	16 ½ “	26 ½ “
Large	17 ½ “	27 “
XLarge	19 ½ “	28 ½ “

Measurements are taken 1 inch below armhole and are approximate.
Measurements may slightly vary.

name: Friends Trini Tee
description:
Friends
Part of the Trini Tee collection Best, Friends, Forever. As a teen, I've always loved those 2 piece broken heart necklaces that had "best" or "friends" on one piece. Why not have them on tees? These tees express who your bestie/besties is/are. Wear together with a friend as "best friends", "friends forever" or with two other friends as "best friends forever". Or to make it a point that the guy you are hanging out with is really just a "friend" , this shirt might make it clear.
Modeled by Felicia.

Style No. 120007
100% Combed Cotton jersey
Direct to Garment printed design, tag and logo.

name: Socie Tee
description:
To be smart. To be rich and famous. To be pretty. To be skinny. To be this or to be that... Whatever!
Tired of the ways of society? Who says you have to be pretty or be skinny? All you have to be is yourself. You're beautiful just the way you are. 
Modeled by Serena
